archiefmat.titel: Documenten waarvan het verband met het archief niet duidelijk is
archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents whose relation to the archive is not clear
archiefmat.scope: Contains a copy of a letter by acting governor Johan Rudolph Lauffer to the West Indian Commitee, regarding a munity among the soldiers of the artillery companies of the National Guard in 1797; a manumission; a procalmation and approbation of a divorce; a register of deaths and a letter Mariano Ospina R. to his daughter regarding miscellaneous subjects.
